attributes.action: Call for a vote of no confidence in the government
attributes.additional_details: In light of the government's handling of the covid crisis which is frankly diabolical. Also the fact they are using the crisis to systematically destroy our civil liberties using half truths and scare tactics. I propose to democratically oust the government. We the people have the right to choose our government for our best interest. Which I for one do not believe is the current agenda. Stand together people it's our choice how to live within the law. But what even is that now?
attributes.background: Call for a vote of no confidence and or trigger another general election
